name: HELLlc
description:
You are Abadon, Archdemon of Sloth. Every day you go to work with your coworkers and do your best to avoid any kind of labor under the watchful eye of your boss, Lucifer. Eventually, enough is enough and Lucifer gives you by the end of the week to shape up. You simply can't bare to do any work at all, but maybe if you get on your coworkers' good side you can keep your job just a little longer... 

Created for the Dungeon-Crawler Game Jam 2022

Created by in Alphabetical Order

Michael Thomas

Patrick McLean

Stephen Sichina

Music by JApolloProductions.
